thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Loved Our Stay
thread.title_full: Loved Our Stay - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lmsmith2
title: Loved Our Stay
text: The French Quarters was a great place to stay for our family. We chose this due to location and reviews of previous guests. We were welcomed the friendly staff and enjoyed a delightful 2-day stay. The rooms were spacious by NYC standards, clean and inviting. The breakfast was a nice continental with many selections of baked goods, yogurt, fruit, coffee and juices. We whole-heartedly recommend the French Quarters as a great place to stay in a smaller location for a personable experience.
